arts.ttl: France 2-0 Croatia (a.e.t, 5-4 pens): Highlights, man of the match, stats from dramatic Nations League quarter-final
arts.sum: France are through to the UEFA Nations League semi-finals thanks to a 5-4 penalty-shootout win over Croatia following a 2-2 aggregate draw at the Stade de France.
